name: Fellowship (NudalZmith, LilRTist, Dan_AudioFile, Rockateer)
description:
*Windows build recommended if Web Build is laggy

This game is made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 with the theme You are not alone.

Fellowship at heart is a game about not being alone and working together.

Controls:

  • WASD: Movement
  • Space: Climbing/ Next Dialog
  • Q E: Rotate Camera
  • Z X: Change Characters

The story follows 21 year old Sammy the Soldier, who is quested by the King Kobra to rescue his daughter, Princess Paulina who is suspected to have been kidnapped and being held in the Devil's Crypt. Turns out that you are not the first to be tasked with saving her and that four other brave heroes have gone missing in the process, presumed dead. With a burning soul of passion, Sammy ventures forth and finds that two the missing heroes are also being held captive and allows them to join on their common goals. After a quick nap, they find themselves separated and must find each other, for the puzzles ahead can not be solved alone!

You must hone these skills to help our trio, Sammy the Soldier, Ally the Archer and Manny the Mage, find the other two heroes, if they may be alive, and find the princess! But something is off... who is the real one being held captive..?

Abilities:

Sammy the Soldier: 

  1. Destroy barrels
  2. Locking switches and keeping that at their state

Ally The Archer:

  1. Shoot arrows and activate buttons and levers from afar.  The arrow freezes the button's timer as well but must maintain a line of sight
  2. Allow other characters to climb on top of her and reach higher places

Manny the Mage:

  1. Select barrels to be teleported to certain locations with glowing purple particles (mostly pressure plates).  Must have a line of sight to the location and be within range
  2. Shielding allies, allowing them to deflect projectiles at a 90 degrees angle

Team:

NudalzZmith - Lead

Rockateer - Programmer

LilRTist - Artist

Dan_AudioFile - Sound Engineer

Manny the Music Man - Music Composer

Assets Used:

  • Unity Toon Shader from Open Project #1
  • Highlight Pro
  • pixelanimationsandeffects for particle effects
